name: Into The Dark (itch) (jsundraws)
description:
Little Timmy was playing ball. 

He played for too long. 

The forest has gotten dark. 

Ma said there are monsters in the dark. 

A lie.

There are sounds in the woods.

Footsteps. 

Timmy needs to go home before it gets any darker. 

Credits:

Developer: Jordon Sun

Character(modified to fit the game): Modern Exteriors by LimeZu

Interior Tiles(modified to fit the game) - Top Down Interior Tileset by Raou 

Forest Tiles (were modified to fit the game): Forest Ruins Top Down Collection by Pixivan, Stranger Forest Tiles by Luis Zuno

Music: It Is Coming by David Fesliyan
